name: @falkor/falkor-auth-server
description: Nginx authentication server to be used with the Falkor Framework

scripts.debug: rimraf .dist/**/* && falkor-bundler --debug --context "#LOCAL #UPDATE_PWD" --input src/index.js && falkor-bundler --debug --input src/passwd.js && falkor-bundler --debug --input src/util/crypto.js --out .dist/util && falkor-bundler --debug --input src/cli/version.js --out .dist/cli
scripts.release: rimraf .dist/**/* && falkor-bundler --release --input src/index.js && falkor-bundler --release --input src/passwd.js && falkor-bundler --release --input src/util/crypto.js --out .dist/util && falkor-bundler --release --input src/cli/version.js --out .dist/cli
scripts.man: pandoc --version && (mkdir .man || rimraf .man/**/*) && pandoc --standalone --to man ./man/man.md --output ./.man/falkor-auth-server.1 && pandoc --standalone --to man ./man/passwd.md --output ./.man/falkor-auth-passwd.1
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run release && npm run man
